documents.title: nearly festival time in south cumbria
text: here 's one you might have spotted if you 've been for a walk through kendal at all in the past few weeks .
a giant banner advertising two of the town 's big festivals has gone up on scaffolding that 's being used to repair kendal town hall .
the first of those events , the lakes international comic art festival , starts on friday 13 october .
next month , it 's the turn of the kendal mountain festival .
festival excitement mounting with this great use of scaffolding by @ twitterid & @ twitterid # sharetheadventure # kendal
such a shame we could n't have wrapped the entire building .
awesome graphics & great printing .
@ twitterid love it !

documents.title: breakingfour men arrested in connection with cash machine theft
text: cumbria police have arrested four men in connection with the theft of an atm in aspatria earlier this week .
the constabulary says the men were arrested yesterday on sus of :
officers are asking anyone with information to contact police by calling 101 or crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111 .

documents.title: another union to strike over sellafield pay dispute
text: member of the trade union unite have confirmed they 'll be taking strike action in a dispute with sellafield management over pay .
the union says that 90 % of its members voted in favour of strike action following their rejection of a 1.5 % pay increase .
last month , members of the gmb union walked out for 24 hours as part of the dispute .

text: cumbria 's headlines
author: Lee Macaulay
Journalist, BBC Cumbria

documents.title: controversial probation changes a 'success story ' in cumbria
text: the government argued its overhaul of probation services three years ago would cut reoffending rates and save money , but it proved extremely controversial .
the union , napo , which represents probation workers , said it would be chaotic , bureaucratic and lead to greater risk to the public .
some inspection reports since the reforms have been highly critical - one in north london described `` extremely poor oversight '' and concluded the city was more at risk as a result .

but in cumbria , the performance of the community rehabilitation company - the privatised part of the service - is a success story : the chief inspector of probation spoke of `` exceptional service '' and `` tireless '' staff .
napo argues this is in spite of the reforms , not because of them , and it comes at a time when the government is already reviewing the way it runs probation .
author: Bob Cooper
Political reporter, BBC Cumbria

documents.title: safari zoo : what does latest inspection reveal ?
text: today , barrow councillors will consider how much progress the south lakes safari zoo has made since a new company was awarded a license to run it .
here are some of the conclusions of an unannounced informal inspection that barrow borough council requested take place in august 2017 :
is a 'suitably qualified person ' managing the zoo ?

lemur feeding

documents.title: minister meets chennai six in indian prison
text: a government minister has met with a cumbrian man and his five colleagues who 've been either detained or not allowed to leave india for the past four years .
john armstrong from wigton was part of a group working on an anti-piracy ship that 's come to be known as the chennai six .
foreign office minister for asia and the pacific , mark field , says he visited the men in prison in chennai yesterday to assure them that the british government is taking their case seriously .
the men are serving a five-year prison sentence after being convicted on weapons charges in 2016 .

documents.title: cumbria celebrates 10 years of bbc introducing
text: ten cumbrian bands have performed in session for the bbc to celebrate a decade of bbc introducing .
the bands were brought together over three days to perform at carlisle 's old fire station .
the sessions will be broadcast on bbc introducing in cumbria from november until the end of the year , with selected video highlights on bbc cumbria 's social media pages .
author: Tom Salmon
Presenter, BBC Introducing in Cumbria

documents.title: england 's big picture : lowther castle
text: every day , bbc news england features an interesting photograph shared with it from across country .
john charlwood took this photograph of lowther castle in penrith .
john says : `` i came across the view of the arched structure which was interesting , i then turned it into a black and white image , which seemed to suit the scene . ''
author: BBC News England

documents.title: inspectors say cumbrian probation company is 'best we have seen '
text: the body that inspects probation services says that the rehabilitation of criminals in cumbria is among the best of its kind in the country .

in a report published by her majesty 's inspectorate of probation , hm chief inspector of probation dame glenys stacey said that inspectors had found `` exceptional practice '' at the cumbria and lancashire community rehabilitation company .

since changes in 2014 , it is one of 21 private companies nationwide that supervise medium and low risk people who are under probation while the national probation service is responsible for high risk people .
the inspection found that the work of the national probation service in cumbria was good overall with some `` pockets of inconsistency '' .

documents.title: fresh concerns over south cumbrian zoo welfare
text: an animal welfare charity says it has raised new concerns with barrow borough council following the latest inspection of a south cumbrian zoo .
the south lakes safari zoo at dalton-in-furness has faced criticism in the past over safety and animal welfare .
zookeeper sarah mcclay was mauled by a tiger there and later died in hospital in 2013 and the zoo went on to admit it had made health and safety breaches in connection with her death .
earlier this year , an unannounced inspection at the zoo reported a number of concerns including an antelope having to be put down because of poor health .
the captive animals protection society says it 's in the public interest to know what condition that animal was in before its death .

documents.title: weather : windy to start before a dry day
text: a very windy start with blustery conditions and a few heavy showers .
an hour or so left of a met office yellow weather warning for strong wind in the south of the county .
a largely dry day to come after that with lots of sunny spells and a few showers .
winds will ease throughout the day but still feeling chilly in that breeze .
highs today reaching 15c ( 59f ) .
get the latest forecast for your local area with bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: welcome to our live coverage
text: good morning .
there 's a slight autumn chill in the air as we kick off another day of live news , weather , sport and travel for cumbria .
stay with us through the day for all that and more ( a few you never know )
if you 've got a story , or want to share a photo with the county , you can email them to us , send them using twitter where we 're @ twitterid or head to our facebook page .
author: Lee Macaulay
Journalist, BBC Cumbria
